newsitem.title: THAILAND: THORESEN THAI TO ISSUE 7.5 MLN WARRANTS.
newsitem.headline: THORESEN THAI TO ISSUE 7.5 MLN WARRANTS.

text.p: Thoresen Thai Agencies Plc said on Thursday it would offer 7.5 million warrants to existing shareholders.

The shipping firm said the warrants would be issued free to shareholders whose names appeared on the registration book on August 27, 1996, and those who subscribed to the company's rights shares in September.

It said the warrants will have a three-year maturity and holders may exercise their rights to acquire shares at the end of each quarter thereafter. The first exercise date is September 30 this year and the last exercise date is June 30, 2000.
The exercise price is 30 baht (96.8 cents) per share.
Thoresen Thai was trading at 16.50 baht per share at 0903 GMT on Thursday, unchanged from Wednesday. ($1 = 31 baht)
